title: @ Rito, What's Miss Fortune's official eye color?
body:
Laughing Fish says Green

I say Blue

Yes, we've both spent too much time squinting at low resolution splash arts

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body: I would say pale blue, based on the concept art from the Art of League book, her Captain Fortune splash, her CG model from the Ryze CG, her merch figure, and the Fortune Smiles comic.  Admittedly, the lighting in a few of these could make it easy to confuse it with green.

I chill here - talking to fellow lore-heads about lore stuff.  Mostly maps, but sometimes other things.  It wouldn't be my place, nor would I be at all informed enough to answer the threads you're probably referring to.  But if you wanna talk story, setting, and lore - I'm here!
